bug.author: breandan
bug.summary: Error building on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS with OpenJDK
bug.description: Had some trouble building this repo on my Ubuntu machine running OpenJDK 1.8 (Maven was complaining about a missing JavaFX dependency). This error disappeared once I installed Oracle JDK. Not sure if this is intentional or not, although if so, it would be helpful to mention the JDK requirement.

comments.comment: Please give us full maven output. Probably that's something minor, like Pair or something like that.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/RobAltena>@RobAltena</denchmark-link> already confirmed this wasn't an issue I believe?
Either use the oracle jdk or openJDK/openFX. Or comment out the example.
